summary: 2010 FORD EDGE TRASMISSION. AFTER DRIVING AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS FOR ABOUT AN HOUR AND THEN COME TO A STOP. WHEN YOU START TO GO AGAIN THE TRANSMISSION FEELS LIKE IT GOES TO NEUTRAL AND THEN SLAMS INTO DRIVE. SOMETIMES IT TAKES LESS THAN A SECOND TO CORRECT ITSELF AND SOMETIMES ITS 2-3 SECONDS BEFORE IT GOES. IT HAS HAPPEND ALMOST EVERY TIME WE DRIVE AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS. DEALER CANNOT REPLICATE THE ISSUE.
